title: Forever Changed
description: Elizabeth Marcus is far from a normal teenage girl. Living in a mansion with only her mother, father, and their maid Julie, she has everything she could ever wish for. However, on the night her mother murdered her father, Elizabethâ€™s world is turned upside down. She has a partial sense of whom and what she is, and now it's her mission to find out fully. She is aware of her ability to change her destiny, but if she doesn't, Elizabeth and her family will be damned for all eternity. Will she be able to change the course of her destiny, or will she be forever changed?
author: Jamie  Gibson
